Name: Welcome Home, Love
About the game: You arrive home to a note from your partner Nick, who has left you a present - If you can solve the puzzles he's left behind. A nice surprise? That dream holiday?... Or something far more sinister? Welcome Home, Love is a narrative-driven VR experience which puts you in Jessâ€™ shoes. Explore her life, listen to her stories and ultimately find what lies at the end. With a few hundred lines of recorded dialogue, interactable objects and a couple puzzles to push you along the way. Features Fully voiced characters and background Over 500 lines of recorded dialogue Large number of interactable objects Rich 'lived-in' environment Built-in hint system And BOB... You get all of Bob. Bob's the greatest. Just ask him.
